RVNL Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for Project Manager Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 11:29 IST
 Rail Vikas Nigam Limited
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 27,000 to 71,000




FOLLOW

The Rail Vikas Nigam Limited (RVNL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of the application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the RVNL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

RVNL Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Project Manager	01	B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering.

RVNL Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 57 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

RVNL Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Screening.
Experience & Interview.

RVNL Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

RVNL Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 27,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 71,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the RVNL Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the RVNL Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Carry all the required documents to the interview.
Attend the interview at the mentioned address.

Address:

Rail Vikas Nigam Limited, Aharika, Ground Floor, R.K. Puram, New Delhi- 110066.

Important Dates:

Starting date	20-08-2025
Closing date	02-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
